metadata.title: CVE-2023-52355 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: An out-of-memory flaw was found in libtiff that could be triggered bypassing a crafted tiff file to the TIFFRasterScanlineSize64() API. Thisflaw allows a remote attacker to cause a denial of service via a craftedinput with a size smaller than 379 KB.

criterions.comment: tiff package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
texmaker package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
neuron package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
